parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.08

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - ListBox

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sorts the ListBox entries by [[lbValue]]. The entries are sorted in ascending order. Also note that this command will mix up the entries randomly if multiple entries have the same value.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''lbSortByValue''' control

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> '''lbSortByValue''' idc <template><title>Since</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.67</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>y</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[lbSortByValue]] _control;</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[lbSortByValue]] 101;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[lbSort]], [[lnbSort]], [[tvSort]], [[tvSortByValue]], [[lnbSortByValue]], [[lbAdd]], [[lbClear]], [[lbColor]], [[lbCurSel]], [[lbData]], [[lbDelete]], [[lbIsSelected]], [[lbPicture]], [[lbSelection]], [[lbSetColor]], [[lbSetCurSel]], [[lbSetData]], [[lbSetPicture]], [[lbSetSelected]], [[lbSetTooltip]], [[lbSetValue]], [[lbSize]], [[lbSort]], [[lbText]], [[lbValue]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dd class="notedate">January 1st, 2011 - 22:54
<dt class="note">[[User:roehre|Roehre]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
A good way to avoid that this Command will mix your Listbox up is, to assign your Value summed up with the Index ID returned by [[lbAdd]] to your Listbox Entries. 
<dd class="notedate">Posted: Sep 10 2014</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:ffur2007slx2_5|ffur2007slx2_5]]</dt>
<dd class="note">More information on the LB command family can be found [[List_Box|here]]
<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
